snippet: Flummoxed and frustrated by wily veteran Paolo Lorenzi for two sets, second seed Andy Murray changed tactics and beat the 34-year-old Italian at his own game to advance to the U.S. Open fourth round on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Flummoxed and frustrated by wily veteran Paolo Lorenzi for two sets, second seed Andy Murray changed tactics and beat the 34-year-old Italian at his own game to advance to the U.S. Open fourth round on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Frustrated Murray Finds Way Past Pesky Lorenzi
headline.main: Frustrated Murray Finds Way Past Pesky Lorenzi
